name: Raid (itch) (Astat)
description:
RAID is a game in which you survive in the world of a zombie apocalypse. You need to find and collect resources such as wood and metal. You need these resources to build your own base to protect yourself from zombies that will want to eat you day and night. You also need to collect food to stay alive and regenerate your health. When you're hungry you won't be able to regenerate.

There is a story behind everything that happens. In this version there are no mysteries that you need to solve, just survival gameplay.

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk
  • E - Eat
  • Q - Toggle Gun
  • Z - Toggle Zoom
  • R - Reload
  • Esc - Don't build
  • F - Throw Grenade
  • RMB - Collect Resources
  • LMB - Shoot

There are a few zones you can survive on: ARENA, DEFAULT, LARGE.

DEFAULT - usual map with average size, all types of recources, less zombies. LARGE - bigger map with all types of resources, more zombies, harder to survive. ARENA - small map with no resources but iron, lots of zombies, created for those, who wants to get tons of iron.

Enjoy the game!
